oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Allylation of caged diketones via fragmentation methodology
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
MANIVANNAN, E
SREENIVASACHARY, N
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: natural-products
organic halides
dodecahedrane
polyquinanes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Fragmentation methodology was utilized to allylate some polycyclic diketones where ionic reactions are inappropriate. These allylated derivatives serve as useful precursors for the synthesis of higher polyquinanes.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE CHEMICAL SOCIETY-PERKIN TRANSACTIONS 1, (19), 2845-2848
